title: Complete the Annual EEO-1 Report
description: A compliance specialist needs to compile and submit the company's annual EEO-1 report to the government.

tasks.description: Generate a report from the HRIS of all employees and their demographic and job category data as of the required snapshot date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist generates the raw data needed for the report.

tasks.description: Format the data according to the EEO-1 reporting specifications.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist correctly maps company job titles to the standard EEO-1 categories.

tasks.description: Submit the formatted data file through the official EEO-1 online filing portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist successfully submits the report before the deadline.
